blockset.description: Is a unique, comprehensive database which connects a product’s Universal Product Code (UPC) with information on the product’s nutritional composition contained on the package label for over 150,000 items. It details UPC ingredient and nutritional composition information covering over 90% of all major product categories. Also includes brand, manufacturer, label claims, and package and serving size.
blockset.title: Gladson : Gladson UPC Information Database

publisher.name: Economic Research Service: Food Economics Division

blockset.title: Government of India:  National Sample Survey: Consumer Expenditure and Employment Data

blockset.title: Haver Analytics: CPIDATA - Consumer Price Detail

blockset.description: Consumer price indexes. Also includes average prices paid for commodities, utilities and fuels, CPI for older Americans, chained CPI, department store inventory price indexes and CPI research series Data
blockset.title: Haver Analytics: Consumer Price Indices

blockset.description: Complete industrial production detail including electric power use for 285 industries and industry groups published monthly in the (G.17) Federal Reserve Board release, Industrial Production and Capacity Utilization.
blockset.title: Haver Analytics: Industrial Production Detail

publisher.name: Economic Research Service:  Market and Trade Economics Division

blockset.description: Monthly, quarterly, and annual gross domestic product and national accounts detail, interest rates, price and production indexes, money and banking, commodity prices, exchange rates, and balance of payments data for nearly 250 countries and regional aggregates as published in the IMF's International Financial Statistics. Also includes the IMF's Financial Soundness Indicators and Fiscal Monitor.
blockset.title: Haver Analytics: International Fincanial Statistics
